description:
The Florida Law Group has multiple offices to serve people injured through no fault of their own. In addition to our South Street location in Orlando, Florida, clients can meet with our law firm team in Lutz, Largo, Miami, New Port Richey or St. Petersberg. We also offer virtual appointments.

A catastrophic injury does not only cause immeasurable pain and suffering; it also completely destroys a person's former life path, from career potential to family relationships to hobbies and other forms of enjoyment. Our law firm collaborates with our clients and fights for the maximum compensation they deserve, charging them nothing unless we reach a settlement or win a verdict.

Whether through our strong negotiation tactics or our experience and skill at trial, we have secured hundreds of millions of dollars for clients. As a result, our attorneys have received a number of accolades, including:

• Acceptance in the Multi-Million Dollar Advocates Forum
• Avvo "Superb" ratings
• Listed in The National Trial Lawyers: Top 100
• Inclusion in the Best Lawyers in America

Our law firm has also handled high-profile cases reported in The New York Times, The Tampa Tribune and The Wall Street Journal.

During a free consultation, prospective clients can share their stories with us, whether it be about an animal bite; a slip-and-fall injury or other premises liability matter; a faulty medical device, dangerous drug or medical mistake; or a motor vehicle accident. The Florida Law Group also takes cases involving brain injuries, birth injuries, nursing home abuse, sexual abuse and wrongful death.
